name: Charmander

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

flavorText: Obviously prefers hot places. If it gets caught in the rain, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail. LV. 10 #4

strengths: High HP of 50 for a Basic Pokemon provides good survivability
Scratch requires only 1 Colorless energy, allowing it to attack with any energy type
Ember deals impressive 30 damage for a Basic Pokemon
Low retreat cost of 1 provides mobility
Evolves into the highly sought-after Charizard line
weaknesses: Ember requires discarding a Fire energy, making it costly to use repeatedly
No resistance to reduce incoming damage
Vulnerable to Blastoise and other Water Pokemon
synergies: Energy Retrieval can recover discarded Fire energy from Ember
Super Energy Removal combined with Ember can control the energy game
Pokemon Breeder allows skipping Charmeleon to evolve directly to Charizard
Defender can help Charmander survive longer against threats
counters: Water-type Pokemon like Blastoise and Lapras
Energy removal to prevent Ember usage
High HP tanks that can absorb Ember damage
